ygData.subject: Re: how do u make compass?
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, and any level can make a compass.  But you technically cannot gain experience until Level 16. I say technically because apparently you virtually cannot
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, and any level can make a compass. But you technically cannot gain
experience until Level 16. I say technically because apparently you
virtually cannot gain experience after Level 16 also. Muffin tin patch
sucks!

Dennis Chan wrote:

> From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
>
> can someone post a recipe pls?
>
> also at what skill level do u try to attempt making a compass?
